member.name: M:RainyReignGames.MeshUtilities.CustomRaycast.Raycast(UnityEngine.Ray,System.Single,UnityEngine.SkinnedMeshRenderer,RainyReignGames.MeshUtilities.CustomRaycast.RaycastHit@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Bake the mesh on skinnedMeshRendered, compute a raycast, and return the hit. No need to bake the mesh before invocation.

member.name: M:RainyReignGames.MeshUtilities.CustomRaycast.RaycastAll(UnityEngine.Ray,System.Single,System.Collections.Generic.IList{UnityEngine.SkinnedMeshRenderer},RainyReignGames.MeshUtilities.CustomRaycast.RaycastHit@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Custom raycast that can hit any of a list of SkinnedMeshRenderer for greater efficiency.
member.returns: Closest RaycastHit. Infinite distance means that there was no hit found.

member.name: T:RainyReignGames.MeshUtilities.CustomRaycast.RaycastHit
member.summary: Some properties of built-in Physics.RaycastHit are read-only, so using a custom struct here

member.name: M:RainyReignGames.MeshUtilities.MeshUtilities.CreateMinimalSkinnedMeshRenderer(UnityEngine.SkinnedMeshRenderer@)
member.summary: Function to create a minimal gameobject hierarchy with skinned mesh renderer, bones, and a mesh. Helpful for calling function on at runtime for JIT compiling.
